member.name: P:ProjectCommon.VegetationMaterial.ReceiveObjectsPositionsFromVertices
member.summary: Gets or sets a value which indicates it is necessary to reveice objects positions from the vertices.

remarks.para: Usually it is necessary for batched geometry (for waving).
Positions will be taken from Type: TextureCoordinates, Index: 4.
